channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
channel.desc: Debbie says doctors told her someone caused bodily harm to her baby, and she thinks her cousin either assaulted the child or is covering up for the real abuser; Steve gives an update on a guest who confessed to abusing her son, but says it was a lie.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Dr. Phil
channel.desc: Three potential adoptive moms say they were scammed by Melissa, a woman who told each that she was pregnant with a child meant for her. She agreed to meet one face to face, but can Dr. Phil convince her to give the same satisfaction to the other two?

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: GMFB: Overtime
channel.desc: Catch up on everything NFL with the latest news, highlights, and player and celebrity interviews with informative and fun discussions on trending topics from across the football world and beyond.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: True Crime News
channel.desc: A hero cop known for arresting thousands for DUI faces a dilemma when he's forced to arrest one of his own; the unsolved case of surgical technician Ashley Brown, who was beaten and strangled after walking out of an apartment.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Crime Expos? With Nancy O'Dell
channel.desc: A woman is discovered murdered and sexually assaulted at the veterinary clinic where she worked; investigators are able to get a full DNA profile of the killer from the victim's body.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: We the People With Judge Lauren Lake
channel.desc: A dispute between exes over a job-hunting wardrobe bought while they were still together; a children's party performer says he was unjustly fired.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: America's Court With Judge Ross
channel.desc: A dispute over a bikini contest prize; a woman sues her ex-boyfriend over a present re-gifted to another woman.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Judge Mathis
channel.desc: A woman says she and her aunt got into a physical altercation, and her aunt bit her, so she's suing her for the cost of medical treatment and pain and suffering; the aunt petitions the court for a DNA test.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Goldbergs
channel.desc: With Adam's graduation approaching, Beverly debates staying on as William Penn Academy's Quaker Warden; Erica tries to get out of the Schwartz's longstanding tradition of dinner together every Sunday.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: The Goldbergs
channel.desc: Beverly volunteers for Hands Across America in hopes of getting closer to Barry and Erica; Adam promises to take his best friend and Dana to the school dance.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Family Feud
channel.desc: Steve Harvey hosts; two families compete to guess the answers to various surveys.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Family Feud
channel.desc: Steve Harvey hosts; two families compete to guess the answers to various surveys.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Bob Hearts Abishola
channel.desc: Kemi leans on Abishola after an argument with Chukwuemeka, disrupting her and Bob's engagement celebration; Dottie gives Douglas a new job at MaxDot.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Bob Hearts Abishola
channel.desc: A conflicted Abishola pushes against her Nigerian roots when she opens up about her past to Dele; Bob attempts to bridge an emotional gap with Douglas.

channel.name: CW Boston US
channel.title: Young Sheldon
channel.desc: Sheldon is forced to take a break from science when his new obsession with "The Lord of the Rings" leads to an unhealthy habit; Missy asks George Sr. to teach her how to play catch.

channel.title: Young Sheldon
channel.desc: George Sr. gets an exciting job offer; Sheldon prepares for his move to California.
